name: Battery Drain the Game
description:
This is a full puzzle game that was going to be sold on Microsoft store, but as this is my first game, I am making it available for free. 

Featuring 21 full puzzle levels complete with achievements for each level.

I would appreciate it if you could share this with family and friends as a lot of effort went into making this. Donations are also welcome.

You can post feedback on the game in the comments and in my discord which I will provide a link to on request.

Enjoy!
